message: So you're growing another year older. You've certainly gotten quite bolder. With incredible style, you've made us all smile. You keep our hearts from getting colder.      Happy Birthday Kiara, hope you liked this limerick! <3

message: A Very happy birthday to the B E S T Mama/Tenchou/Phoenix/Crow/Dog/Cat/Sheep/Frog/Part-itime Warrior-turned-Idol ever! I hope you can spend it with those that love you dearly, Mama and save us employees some cake please <3

message: Wow, it been a year since your first debut, Congrats on sticking around with us for that and achieving so many goals within that one year. I still have a bit longer until I hit my anniversary of falling down this hole.
author: Swan_Flyer

message: Congratulations for reaching your 1 year anniversary! You and the rest of HoloMyth have brought so much joy and happiness to the world this past year. Thank you Kiara, for becoming a phoenix and brightening all our lives.
author: PatrickC

message: It feels like you debuted yesterday but is already been a year. The amount of happiness you gave me is just immeasurable. You are the phoenix that brighten up my path full of darkness. Thank god that I found you Kiara!
author: Mirai_39

message:
It's been quite a year, and meeting you definitely has been one of the best parts of it, along with the rest of Myth. Whatever the future holds, I know you’ll get far. I hope I can be there to see it.
Happy anniversary Kiara!
author: Nelsonseven

message: Kiara, you are a brainy bright and beautiful Phoenix. I never use chat but I watch all your streams while I work! Thank you for bringing me warmth and comfort over such a hard year. Mit dir kann ich am besten lachen 💖
author: SharkoRoblarto

message: Hi Kiara you'rebthe first vtuber that I ever watched and I like to say thank you for your hardwork keep it up
author: Rey

message:
Happy Anniversary, Kiara!
I'm sure that no matter what happens, regardless of what the future holds, you'll always be the one that I adore.
Thank you for being you.
Even after a year, you are the highlight of my life.
author: KyujinQ (Kieu Nguyen)

message: Tenchou Happy Anniversary! When i first started watching u i never thought that someone could be so sweet and caring, thank you for all the memories and encouraging words, you deserve all the love and success in the world <3
author: OakProud

message: Happy 1 year anniversary Kiara! Crazy to think its already been a year with you and KFP. You've accomplished so much this year and given us so many happy memories, cant wait for another year full of Kiara!
author: WanWanAwoo

message: Happy anniversary, boss! The beginning was tough, but you have grown so much and accomplished so many things in this one year! KFP will always be here to support our sun, because you do make our lives brighter. Thank you!
author: Asverd

message: Congrats on your anniversary! I have watched every stream from your new outfit reveal onward. I enjoy your content and I love your songs. I am looking forward to enjoying the next year too! Please look after your health first
author: Broseph303

message: You've been a part of our life for one year and it was amazing. We wish for you and your genmates another year of good times and precious memories. We wanna be phoenix (and not eaten) after all.
author: ZThinker

message: Congratulations on the 1 year Kiara! Your energy and passion that you bring to Hololive and to your streams are an inspiration to us all here at KFP. Congratulations again and good luck in the coming year!
author: Zer0Pendragon6

message: WOOOOOW!!!! Congratulations Kiara and congrats to your gen mates as well, HAPPY FIRST YEAR ANNIVERSARY!!!! (PS. I’m so happy to be apart of this community, y’all are amazing.)
author: Its Manny Man

message: I fell inside the hololive hole a bit more late than I would've liked and couldn't catch your debut, but when I joined your streams I felt immediately welcomed to the family that KFP is. VIVA LA KIARA!!! o7
author: Jowjo - KFP Pigeon

message:
Congratulations Kiara! Thank you for the great memories you created and brought to Hololive and us fans.
I will keep supporting you and your awesome content, i wish you the best!
¡¡Viva la Kiara!! o7
author: Edrian

message: Let us celebrate one year of out glorious not cult of the KPF! And to a hundred more years under the wings of our beloved Phoenix!!!
author: Mugpie

message: I just wanted to congratulate you. You have been a very bright sun in this past year. I´ve been an fan of your´s since your first Debut and i hope that i can be one for all the years to come. KFP loves you.
author: Maniac10-KFPHeartchallenger

message: Kikkeriki Kiara! you've been a huge inspiration of mine and a reliable source of happiness when I was feeling down. Hope the best for you and keep it up! ❤️
author: AG27

message:
Kiara!! Congrats on the one year anniversary!!! I listen to your songs everyday on my way to work so thank you for blessing my travels 🙏 You are my favorite gay chicken and I wish you the best.
Ps: play more Yakuza gaems plz
author: Fosterchair

message: Thank you so much for being yourself! You've made my year so much happier and I hope you continue to smile! Thank u gay chicken
author: Illu

message: Tenchou a year flies so fast and at the same time it seems we've known you forever.  Never doubt your growth, your contribution and your impact to not just Hololive but vtubers as a whole.  We are proud to be your chickens
author: Death Pika the chuu

message: Happy Anniversary, Tenchou! I've seen you accomplish some incredible things in just the few months I have been a member of KFP. You're amazing! Keep up the awesome work! Here's to another year at KFP!!!
author: Davkas

message: Tenchou, We hope you'll be happy in anything and Just be yourself. KFP love you ! We will keep following you in future <3
author: fafa

message: Herzlichen Glückwunsch zum deinen 1. Jährigen Jubiläum! Kaum zu glauben wie schnell die zeit vergeht. Wir hoffen das du weiterhin du bleibst und wir dich noch ein weiteres jahr begleiten können bzw. so lange wie möglich.
author: Gegeji

message: Tenchou, you have made it a full year, a full year of being an inspiration. You have inspired me to be better and resparked my creativity. For that, I am eternally grateful. Thank you, Viva La Kiara
author: Unseen - KFP Nihilist

message: Congrats on your 1 year anniversary Kiara! Wasn't here from the start but anyone can see just how much you've improved since those early days. I'm glad you perservered and bloomed into the great streamer you are today, boss.
author: Naweed Ahmedi

message: 一周年、おめでとうございます！いつも元気な店長が大好きだよ！恥ずかしがり屋の店長も大好きだよ！どんな店長も好き好きです！これからも応援します！
author: Her little sunshine

message:
This past year has been a blast, and we're all looking forward to the next one with you :D
Please take care of yourself (especially health concerns)
author: Upsetti Spaghetti

message: Happy Anniversary Boss! I didn't get to watch u grow from the start but I promise to spend all my time with u 'til the end. You deserve all the love & blessings in this world, don't ever doubt that. TYSM for existing! Ilyy <3
author: Deb

message: Happy 1year Kiara!! It's been a year full of Laughs Fun Memories and Sad moments. Thank you for everything up until now, The hardwork and new things you show us are always appreciated. Hope to watch more of you in the future.
author: kidyeil

message: Happy 1st Anniversary Kiara! It's amazing to see you and KFP grow, you overcame challenges, created exquisite original songs, covers and even created your very own talkshow! Thank you for always making our days brighter :)
author: HypeWyre

message: Hey Kiara congratulations on your first year anniversary! Its been an amazing ride and hopefully we will continue forward making KFP an even better place! Keep rockin it up Phoenix Girl!
author: Velocipablo

message: Congratulations on your 1 year anniversary Tenchou!! It's always nice to think about your journey during this whole year and how much you have conquered! Looking forward to the future as well!
author: Yuriko Kun

message: To the milestone of the 1 year anniversary of your 1st debut! Congratulations! You have made us all very proud chickens! Miss Ambassador GGS Hot Wings. I await what you will accomplish in the next year. Love ya Kiwawa!
author: SpicyChickinTako

message: Kiara, congratulations on your first anniversary! Thank you for all the fun streams you've given us, we really appreciate all the hard work that you do. You are an inspiration to all of us, here's to more years! <3
author: Midknight

message: Keep up the good work Kiara! You have been my oshi for this entire time.
author: Thirstyhiker

message: Kiara, thank you. I forgot what it felt like to enjoy drawing... then I met you! You are super inspiring and I appreciate your hard work. I'll also do my best and continue to support you!
author: somanychens

message: Happy one year! It's been a rollercoaster ride, but you gracefully rose above all odds. Thank you for all your hard work and for the beautiful connection you made with us. Looking forward for more memorable times with you 🧡
author: Inutaco

message: It's been a wild ride watching you for the past year Kiara. You've gone through so much and pushed through it all. I couldn't be more proud to be a part of KFP and show my support. Congrats on 1 year you stunning Phoenix!
author: Darkmaste155 - Proud KFP Employee

message: Congrats on your first year anniversary, Kiara! I will always remember you as my entry into the rabbit hole - my first, if you will. I really love your combo of humor and being true to yourself. Here's to a bright future!
author: azure_blade

message: G'day Hotwings, Congrats on ur 1yr anniv.Its been helluva ride but you made it & achieved most of ur goals. ur dedication, hardwork & love for us is inspiring. I'm so happy & proud of you & will continue to support u my Oshi
author: G. D - KFP

message:
Hi Kiara!
I can hardly believe it's been a year that I've been following you!
Congratulations on your anniversary! And thank you for many hours of fun and enjoyment your streams have brought! Please keep up the good work!
author: Arestris
